properties.name: Berkeley Square Speakers
properties.description: Posted by FreddiedaniellsMeetings begin promptly at 08:00 am on the 1st and 3rd Wednesday of each month at The Lansdowne Club, 9 Fitzmaurice Place, London W1X 6JD, only five minutes walk from Green Park tube station. Check the website for latest meeting times and details.

properties.name: Broadgate Speakers in the City
properties.description: Posted by FreddiedaniellsWe meet the 2nd and 4th TUESDAY of each month at 6.30pm prompt and finish at approximately 9.00pm. Venue: SHOOTING STAR PUB Downstairs private function room 125-129 Middlesex Street, London, E1 7JF Directions and map For further information please contact Patrick Moran on 020 8881 4107. Always check the club website for latest meeting details.

properties.name: Canary Wharf Communicators
properties.description: Posted by Freddiedaniells25 cabot squareCanary Wharf Communicators always welcomes guests. We meet 1st & 3rd Wednesday, 6-7:30pm, 25 Cabot Square. Please contact Anita Jackson (anita.jackson@morganstanley.com or 020 7425 5159) prior to 2pm on our meeting day to have your name entered on the security log.

properties.name: City of London Toastmasters
properties.description: Posted by FreddiedaniellsWe meet on the first, third and, if there is one, fifth Tuesday of every month at The Shooting Star on Middlesex Street, London E1 7JF. Arrive at 6:30pm for a 6:45pm start. The meeting is scheduled to finish at 9pm. To get to the pub, leave Liverpool Street Station via the escalators onto Bishopsgate. Cross Bishopsgate at the lights, then turn left in front of the Police Station. Walk along Bishopsgate then turn right into Middlesex Street (There is a pub called Woodins Shades on the opposite corner). The Shooting Star is on the right hand side just where the road forks into Widegate Street. We meet in the downstairs bar.

properties.name: Early Bird Speakers
properties.description: Posted by FreddiedaniellsEarly Bird Speakers meets every 2nd and 4th Thursday of the month at 07:15am, at the New Cavendish Club, 44 Great Cumberland Place, London W1H 7BS. There is a meeting fee of £3 which covers tea/coffee and fruit. Always check the club website for latest meeting details.

properties.name: Excalibur Speakers
properties.description: Posted by FreddiedaniellsExcalibur, the only advanced club of Toastmasters International in the UK. We meet at : The Cheshire Cheese 5, Little Essex Street London WC2 R 3LD We meet on the 2nd Wednesday of every month. We start at 7.15pm promptly and limit the meeting to close by 9.00pm so that members with long journeys get away on time. Always check the club website for latest meeting details.

properties.name: Grosvenor Square Speakers
properties.description: Posted by FreddiedaniellsWe meet at the New Cavendish Club near Marble Arch. About thirty members meet every 2nd & 4th Monday of each month at 6.30pm (see current schedule). The club is located at 44 Gt Cumberland Place on the corner of Upper Berkeley Street and we meet in the Jubilee Room. The nearest tube station is Marble Arch. Always check the club website for latest details.

properties.name: Holborn Speakers
properties.description: Posted by FreddiedaniellsWe meet at Rugby Tavern, 19 Great James Street, London, WC1N 3ES. We host regular meetings on the second, third and fourth Tuesdays of each month. We also hold special events on the first Tuesday of some months too. Please check our website for latest details on where and when we are meeting.

properties.name: London Athenians
properties.description: Posted by FreddiedaniellsLondon\'s only weekly Toastmasters Speaking Club. All guests are welcome! We meet every Tuesday at 7:15pm at The Hop Poles Pub, 17-19 King Street, Hammersmith, London W6 9HR(Upstairs function room, at the back) A few metres from Hammersmith Underground Station on the Piccadilly, District and Hammersmith & City Lines. Please check the club website for latest meeting details.

properties.name: London Cardinals
properties.description: Posted by FreddiedaniellsWe meet at the Rubens at the Palace Hotel, 39 Buckingham Palace Road, London, SW1W 0PS on the 1st & 3rd Mondays of the month at 7:15 for 7:30pm. Please check our website for latest details on meetings and times.

properties.name: London Communicators
properties.description: Posted by FreddiedaniellsWe meet in the Hilton Hotel in Islington, 53 Upper Street, Islington, N1 0UY on every 2nd and 4th Monday of the month at 6:45pm. We meet in the Hilton Hotel in Islington, 53 Upper Street, Islington, N1 0UY on every 2nd and 4th Monday of the month at 6:45pm. Please check our website for latest meeting times and places.

properties.name: London Corinthians
properties.description: Posted by FreddiedaniellsWe meet on the 1st & 3rd Mondays of the month at 7:15 for 7:30pm start. We meet at Rubens at the Palace Hotel, 39 Buckingham Palace Road, London, SW1W 0PS Please check the club website for latest meeting details.

properties.name: London Olympians
properties.description: Posted by FreddiedaniellsWe meet every 1st, 3rd and 5th Thursdays at 7:15 pm in the upstairs bar of: The Hoop and Toy pub 34 Thurloe Place South Kensington London SW7 2HQ (50 yds from South Kensington tube). Always check the club website for latest meeting details.

properties.name: MLP! (Ernst & Young)
properties.description: Posted by FreddiedaniellsWe meet at: Ernst & Young, 1 More London Place, London SE1 2AF We meet on the 1st and 3rd Tuesdays of the month at 5.45pm. Please contact Susan Hawkins at shawkins@uk.ey.com before noon in order to get access to the building. Always check with her to regarding latest meeting details too.

properties.name: Northern Lights Speakers
properties.description: Posted by FreddiedaniellsWe meet at The Irish Centre, 50-52 Camden Square, London NW1 9XB, usually every first and third Monday each month 7pm for 7.30pm. However in July we will hold meetings on the 2nd, 16th and 30th as we will be closed the month of August. Meetings will start again on Monday 3rd September 2007. Parking is free after 6.30 pm Assemble from 7.00pm (refreshments in the bar), meetings start promptly at 7.30pm and finish at 9.30pm (continues in the bar). Chesck our website for latest details on meeting times and places.

properties.name: Riverside Communicators
properties.description: Posted by FreddiedaniellsWe meet in The Terrace Room at: York House Richmond Road Twickenham London Borough of Richmond TW1 3AA We meet on the first and third Wednesday of each month at 7:15pm for 7.30pm. The meeting closes at 9.30pm. Please check the club website for latest meeting details.

properties.name: Trojan Speakers
properties.description: Posted by FreddiedaniellsYou will find us in the upstairs function room at The Haven pub, just a one minute walk from Ealing Broadway tube and overground station. We meet on the second and fourth Monday in the month at 7.30pm – 9.30pm. We meet at: The Haven 1A Haven Green Ealing Broadway London W5 2UU Please always check the club website for latest meeting details.

properties.name: West London Speakers
properties.description: Posted by FreddiedaniellsWe meet every 2nd and 4th Monday at 7:00pm. We meet at: The Hop Poles Pub, 17-19 King Street Hammersmith, London W6 (upstairs function room, at the back) Please always check the club website for latest details.

properties.name: Women in Banking & Finance - Canary Wharf
properties.description: Posted by FreddiedaniellsIt is a pre-requisite of WIBF Speakers (WIBFS) that you are also a member of Women in Banking and Finance www.wibf.org.uk. Go to the Credit Suisse Main Reception on the Ground Floor of One Cabot Square, London E14. On arrival, go to the Reception Desk and let them know you\'re visiting Toastmasters. You will then be presented with a visitor\'s badge, which should be displayed at all times and returned on exit to the Reception. You will then be directed up to the 7th Floor Conference Centre. Please proceed to the Reception Desk on the 7th Floor where you will be directed to the appropriate meeting room. We meet fortnightly on Wednesdays at 17:45 for an 18:00 start – we alternate our meeting dates with WIBF - City. Please always check our website for latest meeting details.

properties.name: Women in Banking & Finance - City
properties.description: Posted by FreddiedaniellsIt is a pre-requisite of WIBF Speakers (WIBFS) that you are also a member of Women in Banking and Finance www.wibf.org.uk. We meet every fortnight on the alternate Wednesdays to the Canary Wharf Branch. Meetings start promptly at 6pm and finish at 8pm, when we\'ll retire to continue our discussions socially over drinks. We meet at the offices of: Royal Bank of Scotland, 135 Bishopsgate, City of London London EC2M 3TP Always check the club website for latest meeting details.
